mapper.insert: insert into sys_role ( role_code, role_name, role_type, role_status, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time ) values ( #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{roleStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: select sr.role_id roleId, sr.role_code roleCode, sr.role_name roleName, sr.role_type roleType from sys_role sr inner join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = sr.role_id where sur.user_id = #{userId} and sr.role_status = 1
